Name: Troupe Strength
AttributesDescription: Increases Heavy Attack DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 25% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
BgDescription: The troupe's self-brewed liquor, its name a symbol of ownership, power, and honor. The seafarers used to bicker endlessly over what to call it. After many wagers and a fair bit of their private stock on the line, the drunken Fools finally reached a decision: it would be called "Troupe's Strength."
ObtainedShowDescription: Increases Heavy Attack DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 25% for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
